description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-49046) affecting Windows 10 and Windows 11:

1. Download and apply the relevant updates corresponding to your operating system version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system is up-to-date by checking for additional updates in Windows Update after applying the patches.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure that all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition in the Windows Win32 kernel subsystem, which could allow an attacker to elevate privileges.
- Ensure you download the appropriate KB articles for the specific build of your Windows version:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5046665](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)

**Preconditions**:
- Verify Windows version before applying updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with installations.
